title: VISA 230 Painting
description: Development of a variety of techniques and approaches to painting. Emphasis on developing a strong paint vocabulary as well as acquiring knowledge of historical and contemporary issues in painting.
prerequisites: Minimum 72% in each of VISA 180 or 182, VISA 183 and VISA 110.  Students who do not have the appropriate pre-requisites will be de-registered and should contact the Department.
